item.title: Guide to Installing Linux (for beginners)
item.description: Guide to Installing Linux (for beginners) Introduction Hello, this guide is for Linux beginners who are looking to try Linux out don’t know where to start. Below is a table of contents that outlines all the things we will be covering in this guide. Table of Contents - So what is Linux anyways? - What is a Desktop Environment? - Choosing a Distribution - So how do I install Linux? - How to install programs?
